H0.text: Which children’s playground game is sometimes called ‘Fivestones’, ‘Knucklebones’ or ‘Snobs’. Marbles

H1.text: Which children’s playground game is sometimes called ‘Fivestones’, ‘Knucklebones’ or ‘Snobs’. Hopscotch

H2.text: Which children’s playground game is sometimes called ‘Fivestones’, ‘Knucklebones’ or ‘Snobs’. Pick-up Sticks

H3.text: Which children’s playground game is sometimes called ‘Fivestones’, ‘Knucklebones’ or ‘Snobs’. Jacks

A4.text: Knucklebones, also known as scatter jacks, snobs, astragaloi (singular: astragalus), tali Relevant, dibs, fivestones, jacks, jackstones, or jinks, among many other names, is a game of dexterity...

A5.text: Modern knucklebones consist of six points, or knobs, projecting from a common base and are usually made of metal or plastic.
